feed.title: AireCDR Docs
feed.subtitle: Aire CDR Documentation - Find changelogs, tutorials and videos on how to use the Airelogic controlled drugs register

entry.title: Welcome to AireCDR
entry.content:
Welcome to AireCDR.

AireCDR is an electronic controlled drugs register designed to allow organisations that deal with scheduled and controlled drugs to manage and track controlled drugs.
